CustomField.description: The country retrieved from the lead's IP address when they sign-up. It is set when a user account is first created and updated in the scenario where a user account is updated when logging in to the Gearset app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The country retrieved from the lead's IP address when they sign-up. It is set when a user account is first created and updated in the scenario where a user account is updated when logging in to the Gearset app.
CustomField.label: Sign-In Country
